programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: Maneater Of Hydra
programme.desc: While vacationing in the Mediterranean, a group of tourists pay to spend a weekend exploring a lush island occupied by the botanist Baron von Weser and his bloodthirsty, carnivorous plants.

programme.title: Five Dolls For An August Moon [English-Language Version]
programme.desc: An industrialist invites his colleagues to his private island so they can exploit a resin formula invented by one of the guests, but a killer within the group disrupts the proceedings.

programme.title: Dr. Giggles
programme.desc: A madman who believes he's a doctor comes to the town where his crazy father was killed, and soon begins murdering people and becoming infatuated with a teenage girl who has a heart condition.

programme.title: Night Of The Seagulls [Spanish-Language Version]
programme.desc: A doctor and his wife move to a small inhospitable coastal village to discover that undead demon-worshiping Templar Knights haunt the place.

programme.title: Road Games
programme.desc: An American truck driver in Australia starts to suspect a man driving a green van of killing young women along his route.

programme.title: MST3K: The Incredibly Strange Creatures Who Stopped Living And Became Mixed-Up Zombies
programme.desc: A couple of slackers stumble across a cult of monsters at a carnival and becomes a killing zombie.

programme.title: Hush [B&W Shush Cut]
programme.desc: A deaf and mute writemust fight for her life in silence when a masked killer appears at her window.

programme.title: Body Bags
programme.desc: A creepy coroner (John Carpenter) introduces three horror tales involving cadavers in "body bags."

programme.title: Lisa And The Devil [English-Language Version]
programme.desc: A tourist spends the night in a derelict Spanish villa seemingly held in the supernatural grip of an eccentric butler, who resembles a depiction of the Devil she had seen on an old fresco.

programme.title: Dominique
programme.desc: A millionaire, who drove his wife to commit suicide, starts believing that he is being haunted by her spirit.

programme.title: Funeral Home
programme.desc: A young woman turns her Grandmother's house into a B&B. Shortly after, guests wind up missing or dead.

programme.title: Slithis
programme.desc: Leaked radiation mutates something from the sea into a walking man-eating monster.

programme.title: Twins of Evil
programme.desc: A religious sect led by Gustav Weil hunts all women suspected of witchcraft, killing a number of innocent victims. Young Katy, Gustav's niece, will involve herself in a devilish cult, and become an instrument of Justice in the region.

programme.title: Silent House
programme.desc: A girl is trapped in a lake house with no way to communicate.
